posts.post_content:
Hello gang:

So after some time following the birth of my twins, I am doing another run of posters. I am in the process to start a couple new posters, but in the meantime I am running these again, this was the original thread:
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=197069[/url]

All the posters are full color printed in CYMK as a 22” x 28” and will fit into any standard frame. The posters run 18 months were 24x30, but I feel the slightly smaller poster displays much better and less bulky and wanted to note the difference. The posters are printed on styrene which is a plastic that is supposed to be more durable in general and specifically to exposure to light over time. 

Email me at [url]stevensuckow@hotmail.com[/url] or pm me here and I will try to respond asap and always within 24 hours. Feel free to ask any questions about the posters to the same email address and thanks for looking.

Posters available:
1903 e107
1910-11 T3
1915 Cracker Jack
1933 Goudey
1935 National Chicle

Price: 
There is a sliding scale in price, the more you buy the cheaper they get. It goes as follows:
1st poster - $45 + shipping = $55
2nd poster - $35 + shipping = $90
3rd poster - $30 + shipping = $120
4th poster and each additional poster is $25 at that point and that would also include multiple of the same poster.

Shipping: 
All orders include basic shipping, first class shipping USPS for $10 no matter how many posters are ordered. All posters will start to ship in approximately 3 weeks as I process orders and then print the orders.

Payment:
I accept anything; pp is easiest and quickest for me. Contact me for an address if you using check or MO, pp can be made at [url]stevensuckow@hotmail.com[/url]. If you are using goods then add another 3% to the total, if using the friends option there will be no additional charge. International orders will need to contact me. Also, I need an address in the payment and what poster you would like plus additional shipping if it applies.

Custom Posters:
I am now doing custom poster jobs as well and am willing to try and make your vision come to life. This is a bit of work but could do custom posters of your own collection, rarities, combo sets together in one poster. I am open to ideas or even trades.

My Guarantee:
I am doing this because I like this work; I like the people I am meeting and the correspondence that is a direct result from my work. I guarantee to treat each person with respect, follow through with all I promise and generally try and take care of each person. If you ever have any concerns or questions please contact me at [url]stevensuckow@hotmail.com[/url]. I also have several references if anyone needs anything. I appreciate everyone who shares a thought and especially those that have shared pictures of my posters hanging in their homes.
